item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1582; 10:27PM; 1825 S Main St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3uaPytx; Downtown; KNOCKDOWN: Over 50 firefighters extinguished the fire in 36 minutes. The building is a mixed one and two story structure which has previously burned. Firefighters were in the defensive mode and knocked down the fire with no injuries reported. No further details.; FS 10; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 BC13 BC5 CM22 E10 E13 E14 E203 E209 E210 E211 E215 E266 E3 E9 EM11 HR3 RA10 RA3 RA810 SQ21 T10 T11 T15 T3 T66 T9 UR3 UR88; CH9; 13 14; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1582; 09:51PM; 1825 S Main St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3uaPytx; Downtown; Two story (vacant site of previous burn) medical building with fire showing through the roof. The incident is in the defensive mode.; FS 10; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 E10 E209 E210 E9 RA10 RA810 SQ21 T10 T9; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Cliff, Vehicle; INC#1437; 09:15PM; 11401 N Big Tujunga Canyon Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3vGXliA; Sunland; Firefighters made their way down the cliff and are securing the 40 yo male patient into a litter basket. A rope system will be used to assist in raising the basket to the surface. LAFD Air Ops will meet the ground ambulance and provide air transport to the hospital. He is in critical condition. No further details.; FS 74; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; AO1 AO2 BC12 BC14 E274 E289 E298 E474 E89 E98 EM14 EM15 H1 H5 HA1 HA5 HR3 RA74 RA874 RA889 RA89 RH114 T74 T89 T98 UR88 UR89; CH8; 18; Margaret Stewart

Cliff Rescue; INC#1437; 08:42PM; 11401 N Big Tujunga Canyon Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3vGXliA; Sunland; A 40yo male patient is approximately 200' down the cliff side (circumstances causing the fall are unknown at this time). Initial report is the patient is conscious and alert with what is believed to be a significant leg injury. LAFD Urban Search and Rescue resources are responding to assist with the rescue operation. LAFD Air Ops is also on scene and the best method of safely bringing the patient to the surface is being evaluated at this time. The initial call was received at 8:08PM. No further details. ; FS 74; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; AO1 AO2 BC12 BC14 E274 E289 E298 E474 E89 E98 EM14 H0B H1 H5 HA1 HA5 HR3 RA74 RA874 RA889 RH114 T74 T89 T98 UR88 UR89; CH8; 18; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0348; 07:41AM; 12665 W Foothill Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3qkYoUx; Sylmar; KNOCKDOWN: Over 80 firefighters extinguished the fire in 43 minutes with no injuries reported. The fire appears to have started on the 1st floor and extended up to the 2nd and through a common void space (similar to an attic) horizontally to additional units. A total of four units on the first floor and five units on the 2nd floor sustained heavy fire damage. A portion of the 2nd story floor is burned through. The fire was in one, isolated building (they are not connected) in the complex of storage buildings (DBA Public Storage). Firefighters quickly opened units and accessed the void space from the interior and the roof to stop the spread and save the rest of the units. The overhaul will be an extended operation due to the need to empty out the affected storage units to ensure no smoldering materials remain. LAFD Arson is responding for the investigation. No further details.; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; AR1 BC10 BC12 BC14 BC15 BC2 BC5 CM42 E18 E239 E24 E275 E288 E289 E290 E298 E7 E77 E81 E89 EA1 EM14 EM15 EM17 HR3 RA75 RA89 RA898 RA98 T39 T75 T88 T89 T90 T98 UR88 UR89; CH9; 17 18; Margaret Stewart

title.a: Update Structure Fire GREATER ALARM 03/19/2022 INC#0348

item.description: Update GREATER ALARM Structure Fire; INC#0348; 07:16AM; 12665 W Foothill Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3qkYoUx; Sylmar; This is now at a Greater Alarm status with over 80 firefighters assigned. Initial reports of heavy fire in approximately 7 units on both the first and second floor (14 units in total). Firefighters are in the offensive mode and are also getting in position to prevent the spread of fire from the back of the facility to the vegetation on the 118FY embankment. LAFD Arson is responding for the investigation. Fire apparatus and large diameter fire hose are blocking Foothill Blvd at Vaughn St, drivers are advised to avoid the area. ; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; AR1 BC10 BC12 BC14 CM42 E18 E239 E24 E275 E288 E289 E290 E298 E7 E77 E81 E89 EA1 EM14 EM17 HR3 RA75 RA89 RA898 RA98 T39 T75 T88 T89 T90 T98 UR88 UR89; CH9; 17 18; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0348; 06:58AM; 12630 W Paxton St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3643ptX; Lake View Terrace; Two story commercial (Public Storage) with smoke showing from multiple units. Additional resources requested. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 E24 E275 E298 E77 RA898 RA98 T75 T98; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1434; 07:15PM; 8333 N Van Nuys Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3tpaRIV; Panorama City; KNOCKDOWN: Over 70 firefighters extinguished the fire in 53 minutes. The building is updated to a four story commercial (Walmart) with fire on the 2nd floor. The fire sprinkler system activated and there is now a significant water removal operation underway. Four patients were evaluated and declined LAFD transport. LAFD Arson is responding for the investigation. LA Dept of Building and Safety and LA County Dept of Public Health were notified. Cause and $ loss TBD. LAFD PIO Captain Silverman will be on scene for media availability. No further details.; FS 81; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC10 BC12 BC14 CM42 E239 E27 E275 E288 E290 E298 E7 E81 E89 EM14 RA839 RA90 RA98 T39 T75 T88 T90 T98; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Firefighters are in the offensive mode. ; FS 81; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC10 BC12 E239 E290 E298 E7 E81 RA839 RA90 T39 T90 T98; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1376; 06:15PM; 5701 S Avalon; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ud6krV; South Park; *Updated Address* KNOCKDOWN 29 firefighters extinguished the fire in 26 minutes. The fire was contained to the attic and prevented from extending down into the living space. No injuries reported.
